description-page: The privacy policy page of the Dandela Academy platform
title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Protection and processing of your personal data
hero-description: At Dandela Academy, protecting your personal data is a priority. This privacy policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and what your rights are.

subchapters.title: Use of data as part of your learning journey:
content: Creation and management of your user account
Access to courses and training sessions
Communication related to your training journey

subchapters.title: The processing of your data is based on:
content: Performance of a contract (access to training)

chapters.title: Data retention period
chapters.subtitle: Your data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, unless otherwise required by law.

subchapters.title: Your data is never sold. It may only be shared with:
content: Legal authorities if required by law

chapters.title: Data security
chapters.subtitle: Dandela Academy implements technical and organizational measures to protect your data against loss, unauthorized access, or disclosure.

chapters.title: Your rights

subchapters.title: Your rights as a platform user:
content: Right of access to your data

chapters.footer: To exercise your rights, you can contact us at: {{email}}

chapters.title: Cookies
chapters.subtitle: The platform may use cookies necessary for its proper functioning and to improve the user experience. You can manage your preferences via your browser.

chapters.title: Changes
chapters.subtitle: This privacy policy may be updated at any time. The current version is the one published on this page.
